title: Heatmap
text:
Code
import pandas as pd
df = pd.read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/plotly/datasets/master/earthquakes-23k.csv')

import plotly.express as px
fig = px.density_map(df, lat='Latitude', lon='Longitude', z='Magnitude', radius=10,
                        center=dict(lat=0, lon=180), zoom=2,
                        map_style="open-street-map")
fig.show()




                                                


Figure 1: Heatmap using Plotly

import pandas as pd

title: Heatmap
text:
Demo using Folium and Leaflet


Code
import numpy as np

data = (
    np.random.normal(size=(100, 3)) * np.array([[1, 1, 1]]) + np.array([[48, 5, 1]])
).tolist()

import folium
from folium.plugins import HeatMap

m = folium.Map([48.0, 5.0], zoom_start=6)

HeatMap(data).add_to(m)

m




Make this Notebook Trusted to load map: File -> Trust Notebook


Figure 2: Heatmap using Folium and Leaflet
